    About Eric Mortimer


    Eric Mortimer is an award winning real estate agent and Agent of Change. As he says, “sometimes I help people move geographically and sometimes I help people move emotionally, mentally, and spiritually.”

    Being a guide and coaching you expedite your personal and professional success is Eric’s true passion and purpose.

    In addition to being on of Calgary Top Realtors, some of Eric’s background also includes: sharing the stage with a number of our living luminaries, Founder of the Clarity Circle, being a Certified High Performance Coach, turning around two Calgary branch offices for multinational corporations, increasing a number of people’s net and self-worth, hundreds of thousands of video views and more on social media, and marrying an amazing woman that puts up with his sense of humor. He was also just awarded MAN OF THE YEAR by Mentor Discover Inspire, an international organization dedicated to personal growth.
